name: Uncoven: The Seventh Day
storyline:
Nyx joins their friends after several years of separation. Reunited in a mysterious house in the middle of the woods, they are tormented by strange events...

Doubt reigns: does one of them have bad intentions? Or is there something more dreadful here that is looking to hurt them...?

Incarnate Nyx in this enigmatic visual novel. Discover the mysteries of the place where you will spend your week on vacation. Seven days can turn a life upside down. Don't forget: keep your eyes open.
summary: Your adventure begins at the doorstep of a house, lost in the middle of the woods, and that is filled with mystery. You join your friends for seven days of vacation and relaxation, but things don't go as planned... Strange phenomena will question your reality and transform you, for better... or worse.
